hero.title: Alexey Solyanoy
hero.subtitle: Prompt Engineer | Web Developer | AI Creator | Automation Specialist

profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.description: An enthusiastic and goal-oriented AI specialist with a deep passion for innovation and cutting-edge technologies. Extensive experience in developing AI solutions, prompt engineering, and business process automation. Runs a personal Telegram channel on AI news and innovations, sharing up-to-date research and personal developments. Always open to learning and new opportunities. I embrace change, as every innovation is a chance to grow and discover something new.

list.promptEngineering: Prompt Engineering: Expert in creating and optimizing prompts for AI models. Customizes models to meet specific client tasks.
list.aiAssistants: AI Assistant Development and Integration: Configures AI assistants in various messengers using platforms like Make.com, Zapier, and SendPulse to enhance client interactions.
list.webDevelopment: Web Development: Professional skills in front-end development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript). Creates interactive and dynamic web applications, automating manager workflows (ProAir, ProViz projects).
list.chatBots: Chatbot Creation: Develops GPT-based chatbots and integrates them into various platforms. Experience working with Node.js and the Telegraf library.
list.aiConsulting: AI Innovation Consulting: Provides qualified business consultations on selecting and implementing optimal AI solutions.
list.aiContentCreation: Content Creation with AI: Uses AI for creating graphic, audio, video, and textual content. Expert-level proficiency with platforms like MidJourney, ChatGPT, Claude.ai, and working with APIs such as ChatGPT, Anthropic, HuggingFace.
list.teaching: Educational Materials and Training: Author of educational materials on prompt engineering and AI technologies. Conducts consultations and training courses on automation and AI implementation.

details: Participated in the development and launch of VDFY — a platform for video reviews of public opinion. Simplified the process for NGOs, made it transparent for donors, and faster thanks to AI.
Created automation systems for managers, including web development and AI tool integration, improving efficiency and enhancing client service.
Developed an AI-based audio call analyzer to improve service quality and identify key moments in client interactions.
Automated routine manager tasks, reducing operation time and increasing team productivity.
Integrated AI assistants into various messengers, improving client interactions and automating processes.
Completed over 100 orders for creating effective prompts for diverse business tasks.
Developed interactive web applications using JavaScript, enhancing user experience and site functionality.
Integrated AI bots and chatbots into client websites, improving user interactions and boosting conversion rates.
Advised companies on implementing AI solutions and automating processes, providing expert recommendations and support.
Frontend Training Club: Training in front-end development, mastering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Prompt Engineering: Courses on creating and optimizing requests for AI models.
Process Automation Course: Specialized training in automating business processes using AI technologies.

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information
details: Telegram channel on AI news and innovations: Manages a personal channel sharing current news, research, and personal developments in AI.
Languages: Ukrainian — native, Russian — fluent, English — intermediate.
Personal qualities: Communication skills, teamwork, problem-solving, critical thinking, time management, lifelong learning.

achievements.title: Achievements
list: Created unique graphics for video games using AI, enhancing visuals and attracting more users.
Developed an AI-based audio call analyzer, improving service quality and communication efficiency.
Automated key manager tasks, increasing productivity and reducing time spent on routine operations.
Consulted companies like OsviTech, JetCup, AltaKav on implementing AI technologies, helping optimize processes and enhance efficiency.
Created educational resources on prompt engineering and AI, contributing to professional development and AI technology popularization.
